properties.address: Hospital Road, Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk IP33 3JT
properties.description: Open Saturday mornings from 11:00am to 1:00pm for a warm welcome and friendly chat. Tea, coffee, cake and sometimes sausage rolls available for FREE. Children's craft area, Board Games and Internet Access also available. All welcome!
properties.title: Community Space

properties.address: Stowmarket Community Sports & Social Club, Suffolk IP14 1JQ
properties.description: Stowmarket Community Sports & Social CIC is the base of Stowmarket Town Football Club. Easily accessible in Stowmarket, either by car or on foot, we will be opening up our bar area, and providing an urn with tea/coffee free of charge.
